relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, moist mucous membranes
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/gallops/rubs
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, mildly tender to palpation in bilateral lower quadrants, no rebound or guarding, no palpable masses
relevant_findings.drains: Left-sided drain with minimal clear fluid, right-sided drain with brownish fluid, both insertion sites clean, dry, and intact
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused
